section.name: stx_fsw_module_flare_detection
section.description: Generates a flag for each accumulation bin whether a flare is in progress or not, incl. a flare intensity.

parameter.name: execution_frequency
parameter.description: Update frequency of this module in 4 seconds base interval

parameter.name: nbl
parameter.description: Seconds for the median window of 2 time series.

parameter.name: thermal_cfmin
parameter.description: Count threshold to turn on a flare for both time series in the thermal band.

parameter.name: nonthermal_cfmin
parameter.description: Count threshold to turn on a flare for both time series in the nonthermal band.

parameter.name: thermal_kdk
parameter.description: Relative kdk factor for both time series for the thermal band.

parameter.name: nonthermal_kdk
parameter.description: Relative kdk factor for both time series for the nonthermal band.

parameter.name: thermal_krel_rise
parameter.description: Relative krel factor for both time series for the thermal band.

parameter.name: nonthermal_krel_rise
parameter.description: relative krel factor for both time series for the nonthermal band.

parameter.name: thermal_krel_decay
parameter.description: Relative krel factor for both time series for the thermal band.

parameter.name: nonthermal_krel_decay
parameter.description: relative krel factor for both time series for the nonthermal band.

parameter.name: kb
parameter.description: Background scaling factor for all energies and times.

parameter.name: flare_intensity_lut_file
parameter.description: This is a file path to the flare intensity lookup table.

section.name: stx_fsw_module_background_determination
section.description: This module calculates the background monitor output.

parameter.name: default_background
parameter.description: Default value for background (nql is the number of energy intervals in background accumulators)
